documents.document: So excited when coaching client does their first 100 miler! Congrats Pam - sub-23hr finish @ #RR100 - 9th place female. #sharmanultraathlete
@VanFirstHalf @VarietyBC Super PRR! Great that Variety does not loose out and work of First Half has not been in vain. See you in 2018 :)
For any event First Half is leading the way of how events should be operated ... & they are a small club event putâ€¦ https://t.co/BjthkrTjEz
@EvanDunfee @ProfTimNoakes @gypsygooner Is that you saying your going to do a 100 miler, Evan? :)
@mikewardian I thought you were unbreakable and don't need a physio ;) So fun watching your 777 - huge congrats!
Oh. You don't email your physio photos like this? I thought everyone did! ðŸ˜‰ X marks the spot! https://t.co/FqvZvcaE9J
@MountainRoche @trailrunnermag ha ha! I won't ask you yet! I should do more than 10 mins but it's a start!
@MountainRoche @trailrunnermag I've done this every day except 3 since you posted this. 10 mins every damn day. Thanks for the motivation!
#tbt Coastal Rainforest Wanderings. 2014. ðŸ“·: Brian McCurdy. https://t.co/8PazmyG01f
@maddenam @neasacoll @SalomonRunning Want to hear your stories, Neasa and just see you when you're back! X
Eagle sighting on Thunderbird Ridge. https://t.co/cjYK6QcIuZ
@00joeuhan @sharmanian The race ain't over til the finish line - you had time to catch us Joe :)
@sharmanian @00joeuhan @mariofraioli Classic rivalries hard in ultras when # races limited & so many races (and variety) = dilution.
Pre race meeting ahead of @VanFirstHalf #fhhm17 next Sunday. Looking forward to being part of the ðŸŽ¤ mc crew! https://t.co/wukQTdvHbf
@neasacoll Hope to see you there, I'm helping emcee
@Talkultra @UltraRunnerPod @nikkimball Biggest honour was Nikki presenting me with my WSER trophy.
@runner_kc @UltraRunnerPod It's generational - when I was new to ultrarunning my inspriations were Lizzy, Nikki, Kami & Krissy :)
@UltraRunnerPod If @nikkimball wasn't on the list I'd not be buying a shirt!A people vote but still wish Lizzy, Krissy & Kami were there too
Congratulations @mirarainepal ! A heart as big as the mountains she runs in. #runlikeagirl https://t.co/7OSydPJcGB
People & The Planet - the 2 main reasons I love @ClifBar Check out this video to see their commitment to organic faâ€¦ https://t.co/MutW2uGBjt
Too bad people like David Attenborough are not politicians. https://t.co/RjigU2QPRj
Woman in coffee shop,'wow, you never usually wear jeans' Uh no, cause stretchy run tights are more forgiving on injured runners #skinnyjean
@MountainRoche But sign posts help you know what direction you are going in! ;) I get your point though :)
@UltraRunnerPod @runinrabbit Yes! That would be super. :)
Check out this fun, cool initiative and vote! #runlikeagirl https://t.co/Ka10fYDkRl
Looking forward to mceeing at @VanFirstHalf in less than 2 weeks time! https://t.co/hzcqR50czf
It's January so just a reminder, North Americans, it's St Patricks Day or Paddys. No Pat. No Patty's. No, I'm not Irish but Celtic at least!
I don't care what you say, my massage therapist is better than yours! Grazie, merci, thank you @BCTherapia
@TransLink Hopefully you can better brief drivers unused to certain routes. Traffic delays are unavoidable,sightseeâ€¦ https://t.co/BEGmSxpY8J
@TransLink Correction,3pm fr.Lonsdale/ 11th. He had to turn around on both journeys making it longer. Road works fâ€¦ https://t.co/qsjI5BZeHz
@TransLink Driver of #232 @ 4pm fr Lonsdale/ 11th & same driver 232 5.30pm fr Grouse took wrong turn both ways. Drivers should know routes.
Had forgotten I'd done a gym session with @peakpowerhealth yesterday until I wrestled rain soaked sports bra off. #ouchlittlearms
Super @florahealthy goodness for the miles ahead. https://t.co/GxXzuyFAq7

@KLM_UK 2 of 2. Having to beg for something I paid $1000s months ago for unacceptable. Cannot DM you as low batterâ€¦ https://t.co/zfeygctOVX

Well done @KLM_UK - send me email 2 check in online, unable to do so, 30mins on phone hold 2 be told online check in not possible. It's 2016

Running kms: 2016 - 4286, 2015 - 5357, 2014 - 6444. 2017 - better darn well reverse the trend.
@korremania Yep, lots to work on with running form there.
@TheodorWeideman Maybe I should take up competitive headstands!
According to physio I don't stand great,look awkward walking (agree)& much better running. That's saying something as I look awful running.ðŸ™„
@Claudibus Darn - I was actually hoping I could just learn some calculus to get over my injury!
@Claudibus 1st read this as u saying I needed 2 get smarter! Will check it out & interesting many Barkley finishers have postgrad degrees
Looking to train for 1/2 or Full marathon this spring in North Van? Come join the @TheRunCentre clinic I help lead. https://t.co/jqh4NbGVD5
@KateKatecooke Merry Christmas to you and your family, Kate! Here's to more 2017 adventures on the trails - for both of us!

Huge congrats to friend & coaching client @LanGreyling . Outstanding year for Landie! #runlikeagirl https://t.co/R292SLfLiS
@Salomon_SA Way to go @LanGreyling ! Way to crush it!
@amawebs @BrentRichter Who said the passengers weren't respectful. Let's await outcome. I've seen as many rude drivers as passengers.
@ryansandes @UltratrailCT Cheers for Landie from me!
@BrentRichter Even if delay was not drivers fault, unacceptable way to treat folks just trying to get from A to B.
@BrentRichter I use the 232 service numerous times week, some drivers awesome, others not ... and often late (even if no snow).
@amawebs @BrentRichter Not all adults have the option to drive - we don't all own cars or have folks to carpool with.
For anyone who ever thought ultrarunning was just about plodding along, I suggest you watch this. https://t.co/ylcp8E1GNF
@pladawalker Good to know (given I've just updated your training plan for Christmas Day :) )

@MarvellousMimi Sounds very you! Merry Christmas :)
I always ask my coaching clients this as I prep their training plans right now. Do you run on Christmas Day or not?
@Wildman_since04 Thank you :)
